title: Cognitive-Based English Vocabulary Learning Project for Large-Scale Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills, ability to comprehend job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Program focused on acquiring academic and social vocabulary immediately applicable in workplace environments for practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will accurately utilize 150 Academic Word List (AWL) vocabulary items related to their professional field.
Learners will infer the meaning of new vocabulary with 80% accuracy by applying prediction, modeling, and automation strategies.
Learners will propose strategies to apply acquired vocabulary to real-world professional scenarios through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
